name: Heart's Bakery
description:
Built for Mac

Hailey Heartfeld lives in a world where true loves see a visual of the other's heart upon their chest. The more fulfilled in life a person is, the more full their heart is. Hailey has always been able to see everyone’s heart, regardless of true love status. She’s dedicated her time to running a bakery to contribute to making a person’s heart a little more full each day. When two new faces approach her at the shop, how will she handle the pressure of their near empty hearts?

----

Controls:

 Left click to make choices

Spacebar to progress the story.

----

Credits

Programming: Zhenjie Yu

Art: Sabrina Pagoaga, Meredyth Yorek, Emily O’Neil

Story: Emily O’Neil

Sound: Meredyth Yorek

Made in Unity

Assets done in Photoshop 2023 and Procreate

Music made in Auxy
